input.sentences: i made myself a cup of tea earlier .
when i finished it i went for a short walk .
after i got back i spent some time working .
there was an accident outside and i watched the paramedics load someone into the ambulance .
at night i went back out to see the christmas decorations .
output.sentences: Earlier today, I had a cup of tea.
My morning walk was shorter than normal and I was finished earlier than normal.
I used the extra time to sit on my porch and relax.
Then I watched paramedics load my neighbor into an ambulance.
Last night, a box of Christmas decorations fell on him and no body found him until morning.
